availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Pope Anderson (Cincy OH, assistant Adj General to General Ambrose Burnside)

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, civil engineer and soldier. Ohio native. Son of Larz Anderson and Catharine Longworth. Married to Julia Worthington Anderson on July 21, 1863. Father of Vachel W. Anderson. Civil engineer in Cincinnati in 1860. Served in the 6th Ohio Infantry Regiment as captain and in the Department of the Ohio as assistant adjutant general from September 15, 1862, to March 18, 1864.
